description:
Tsuna and his friends successfully obtain their inheritance, and they go back to the future. Yuni and Reborn are there to take back the pacifier they had left with Lal. Reborn tells Lal all about what Tsuna and the gang went through in their succession tests. But through all the adversity, Tsuna and his friends were able to embody their roles as Vongola Decimo and his Guardians. As a result, the gang was not only able to obtain their inheritance, but also strengthen the bond of the group and prepare themselves in face of the battles ahead.
Source: crunchyroll
